The last chairman of the Federal Communications Commission
wondered whether the FCC has authority to judge the program
performance of American radio and television stations, but
there is no question at all about the situation in England*
Let me quote a few sections from the Television Act of 19540
ITA programs are to maintain "a high general standard of
quality©” Contracts with companies must "contain all such

News must be presented "with due accuracy and impartiality©"
ITA programs are to contain no editorializing, and there are to
